head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAY, MORRIS L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAY, MORRIS L.

block.p: RAY-Morris L. Age 87. Died September 11, 2000. Attorney and retailer for many years. Beloved husband of Esther, father of Diane and Linda; proud grandfather of Maya, Naomi, Justin and Nicholas. Appreciative father-in-law to Patrick Keeffe and Paul Schoenfeld. His strong spirit will live in our hearts forever-The Family. Donations to American Parkinson Disease Foundation.
